additional_data: Horse riding will be optional during the whole camp – if interested please sign up at the registration desk and we will inform  you about the details. * All gatherings for gifferent outdoor acctivities and for departures for day trips during the tango camp  will always be in front of the Culture center, except when announced otherwise. Also, departure to each destination will be exactly on the specified times.

activities.description: 10:00 – 11:30  Yoga  Primary school

11:45  Excursion to Ski center Kolašin 1450   Options: gathering* 1. chill out at cafe restaurant Ski center Kolašin 1450 2. going to the top of the mountains with the ski-lift ( 3 eur ) , short hiking tour  After that open milonga until the sun goes down    DJ Sonja / If someone wants to stay and dance in Kolašin it is obligatory to come and sign up at the registration desk latest by 23:00 on Saturday: if there will be 10+ people interested in staying we will organize practica
